text: The National Democratic Front of Bodoland, also known as NDFB or the Bodo Security Force, is an militant group in Assam, India. They want to make an independent Bodoland for the indigenous Bodo people. The founder of the organization, Ransaigra Nabla Daimary (Ranjan Daimary) has been arrested and detained by Indian government. Category:Separatist movements of India Category:Nationalist organizations in India Category:Rebel militia groups in Asia Category:Organizations based in Assam
title: National Democratic Front of Bodoland
